name: y-rfc6902
description: Complete implementation of RFC6902 (patch and diff) for YJS
author: Winston Fassett <dev@winstonfassett.com> (https://winstonfassett.com)

scripts.dist: tsc -t ES2015 -m es2015 && rollup index.js --output.format umd --name y-rfc6902 --output.file dist/y-rfc6902.js --external yjs --globals yjs:Y && closure-compiler dist/y-rfc6902.js > dist/y-rfc6902.min.js
